Notes: Rounded letterforms feel approachable and modern. Great Flutter default.

Notes: High contrast serif/sans for premium feel. Avoid small sizes for Playfair.

Notes: Space Grotesk has unique geometric character. DM Sans extremely readable.

Rounded forms reduce cognitive load for children. High legibility.

Best For: SaaS, corporate, business apps, startups, agencies
Notes: Geometric Poppins for headings. Humanist Open Sans for long body text.

Best For: Publishing, news, blogs, literary apps, culture
Notes: All-serif creates cohesive traditional editorial feel. Use sufficient size.

Notes: JetBrains for code blocks. IBM Plex Sans for UI text. Strong tech identity.

Bebas Neue for large display text only. All caps. Very impactful.
